channel.title: Posts on Ang Mo Finance
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ang Mo Finance
channel.copyright:
© Yours, Ang Mo, 2021

The content of this blog shares a personal opinion and experience. It is for information purposes only. It does not constitute financial advice or investment advice.

item.title: Cash accounts
item.description: In my previous post, I already touched on the topic of cash accounts while choosing where to keep my emergency fund. Today I want to elaborate on it more. What products are available in Singapore, and why do I use them.

item.title: Saving and Investment accounts overview
item.description: This post describes some of my current accounts, what is the reasoning behind each of them.

item.title: Budget and expense tracking
item.description: To kick-off my investment journey, the first step was to make a budget. And to make a budget, I needed to know my expenses.

item.title: Let's start
item.description:
Hello there!

In this blog, I want to share my finance and investment journey as an Ang Mo (white person) in Singapore.

It might be useful for young foreigners in a similar situation as I am, could be interesting for the more general public as most of the learnings are universal or it can be read just for laughs.
